chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Adelorna Bastine,
      p. 51 (45)â€”Aes
      Sedai of the Green Ajah.  She is the Captain-General of the Green Ajah,
      the Ajah's leader.  She was once birched by
      Elaida.  She chose Rina for the
      Hall without a nominations process, which goes against Green custom.
